**Summary**
• Anthropic pays $1.5B for copyright infringement, but writers see none of it.
• The payout is for illegal book downloads, not AI usage, so it’s bullshit for authors.
• This “settlement” is a joke — it doesn’t fix the systemic issue of AI exploiting creators.

Impact — This half-assed settlement leaves writers high and dry while AI companies keep profiting off their work.
